# gitignore-gen Examples

## Single language

```bash
./scripts/run.sh python > .gitignore
```

Output:
```gitignore
# Generated by gitignore-gen
# Templates: python

*.egg
*.egg-info/
*.pyc
*.pyo
.eggs/
.mypy_cache/
.pytest_cache/
.venv/
__pycache__/
build/
dist/
htmlcov/
```

## Combined templates

```bash
./scripts/run.sh python node macos vscode > .gitignore
```

This merges all patterns from python, node, macos, and vscode into a single deduplicated, sorted file.

## List available templates

```bash
./scripts/run.sh --list
```

Output:
```
Available templates:
  c           cpp         csharp      dart        elixir
  emacs       go          java        jetbrains   javascript
  kotlin      linux       macos       node        python
  ruby        rust        swift       typescript  vim
  vscode      windows
```

## Pipe to file

```bash
./scripts/run.sh rust macos vim > .gitignore
```

## Error on unknown template

```bash
./scripts/run.sh python fakename
# stderr: Error: unknown template 'fakename'
# exit code: 1
```
